io.atomix.protocols.raft.protocol

Interface RaftServerProtocol

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalRaftServerProtocol, RaftServerMessagingProtocol

    public interface RaftServerProtocol
    Raft server protocol.

                           Consumer<ResetRequest> listener,
                           Executor executor)

        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session ID for which to register the listener
        listener - the reset request listener to add
        executor - the executor with which to execute the listener

      • unregisterResetListener

        void unregisterResetListener(SessionId sessionId)
        Unregisters the given reset request listener.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session ID for which to unregister the listener
